name: Korekiyo Love Simulator
description: A short, very basic visual novel made with Ren'py.  This is a Danganronpa V3 fangame, borrowing official assets, in which you can chose how to spend your time with Kiyo.  The scenes and ending you get depend on the choices you make, but all options mean that Kiyo loves you and you have a wonderful time! Enjoy!
